name: Seismic Strike
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
As you cast this spell, you emit a nearly-imperceptible tremor that briefly reveals the location of all creatures within range of this spell that are on solid ground. You can then strike a surface to send a powerful shockwave through the earth to attack a creature within range. Make a magic attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 damage, which can't be reduced or negated.

Burrowed creatures are vulnerable to the damage dealt by this spell. A creature hit by this spell loses their burrow speed until the end of your next turn and is forced to the surface.
empower: The target loses their burrow speed for 1 minute on a hit instead. They can make a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of their turns to end this effect early.
